---
title: "Dashboard"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: columns
    vertical_layout: fill
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)

```


```{r}
data("rest_inspec")

rest_inspec <- 
  rest_inspec %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  filter(
    grade %in% c("A", "B", "C"),
    boro != "Missing")


```


```{r}
rest_inspec %>% 
  drop_na(boro, score) %>% 
  group_by(boro) %>% 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~boro, y = ~score, color = ~boro,
    type = "box", colors = "viridis"
  )

```
